overview: Having casually overheard a confusing phone conversation between two women, Alberto manages to get in touch with one of the callers, Claudia, a painter.  The two become lovers and things are spiced up by Claudia's ambiguous sexual nature and by the presence of her former lover, Pietro.  Alberto discovers a pistol in Claudia's handbag and this leads to a further revelation:  she's dominated by her stepmother Greta, who forced her into a clandestine lesbian relationship; of which Claudia is ashamed and wants to end - at all costs.  Alberto, now a slave to love, runs Greta over.  But Claudia denies urging him to murder...
title: A Rather Complicated Girl
